name: CreateInterbranchOrder
description: Convert the given `Order` to a InterbranchOrder.

properties.name: ExpectedDeliveryDate
properties.description: The date when the shipment is expected in the other store

properties.name: OrderID
properties.description: The Order to convert to an interbranch order.

properties.name: OrganizationUnitID
properties.description: The destination OrganizationUnit of this Interbranch order. This will become the SoldToOrganizationUnit of the order.
